name: Space Berg Adventure
description:
An innovative shoot 'em up game where you control your character by rotating your phone, while advancing through the map and fighting against the Cyber Crocs.

Try to destroy your enemies while dodging their lasers and kamikazes. Power Ups will appear on the way, so pick them up in time.
